sections.title: What KRAK is and how the bonus works
content: KRAK is Kraken's mobile app, a well-known cryptocurrency exchange that allows you to buy, sell and transfer cryptocurrencies directly from your phone.
The app offers a $10 welcome bonus for new users who have never had a Kraken account.
For each friend referred who completes the requirements, a $10 bonus is awarded.
The typical procedure involves depositing about ‚Ç¨12 via bank transfer and sending at least ‚Ç¨1 to another user using the app's "Send" function to unlock the bonus.
The bonus is generally credited within 14 days after the conditions have been met.
Document verification (KYC) and proof of residence are required; the offer is available only to adults (18+).

sections.title: Requirements to get the bonus
content: Be a new customer who has never had a Kraken account before.
Register on the KRAK app (email, password, phone number).
Complete KYC verification by uploading a valid ID (identity card, passport, or driving licence) and provide proof of residence if requested.
Deposit around ‚Ç¨12 via bank transfer (SEPA or SEPA Instant).
Send at least ‚Ç¨1 to another user from the app to unlock the bonus.
Wait for the bonus to be credited (up to 14 days).

sections.title: Step-by-step guide to activate the account and unlock the bonus
content: 1. Download the KRAK app for Android or iOS and start the registration.
2. Enter your email, password and phone number; complete the initial signup.
3. Complete KYC by uploading an identity document and proof of residence when requested.
4. Make a deposit of about ‚Ç¨12 via SEPA bank transfer (you can also use card or PayPal but check fees).
5. Use the app's "Send" function and transfer at least ‚Ç¨1 to another user to meet the required condition.
6. Once all conditions are verified, you will receive a notification and/or email: the bonus is credited within 14 days.

7. If you want to withdraw the balance in EUR but are below the direct withdrawal threshold, consider converting to a stablecoin and transferring to another wallet/exchange to reduce fees and reach the withdrawal threshold.

sections.title: Other information and useful tips
content: The recommended deposit (‚Ç¨12) is usually withdrawable immediately, but many users prefer to leave the amount in the app until the bonus arrives for safety.
The bonus is paid within 14 days if all conditions are met; keep confirmation emails.
To withdraw in euros there may be a minimum threshold (approximately ‚Ç¨100) and conversion costs ‚Äî check the app's current conditions before converting or withdrawing.
Fees and network options (for example Solana, Polygon, Arbitrum) affect transfer costs: choosing low-fee networks can reduce expenses.
A cumulative limit for referrals is indicated (reported as max ‚Ç¨1000 in official communications).
Always read the full Terms & Conditions in the app before proceeding.
